name: Name
title: Title

app.name: cannafriend
app.installPWADesc: Install Cannafriend on your device for quick access

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.introDesc: Cannafriend helps you track cannabis growing and consumption. This policy describes what we collect, how we use it, and your choices.
privacy.collectionDesc: We only collect what is necessary to provide the app. This may include:

data.account: Account data: email, authentication identifiers (via Firebase Authentication).
data.content: Content you add: plants, journals, nutrients, reminders, stash items and related notes.
data.images: Images you upload (stored in Firebase Storage).
data.device: Technical data: device/browser type and usage needed to operate and secure the app.
data.payments: Subscription metadata handled by payment processors (Stripe/MercadoPago). We do not store full payment details.
data.storage: Local storage/PWA caches on your device for offline functionality.

usageItems.provide: Provide and maintain the service (sync, storage, login).
usageItems.support: Provide support and respond to requests.
usageItems.security: Protect against fraud, abuse, and technical issues.
usageItems.comms: Send service-related communications (e.g., subscription or critical notices).

legalBases.title: Legal bases (EEA/UK)
legalBases.desc: Where applicable, we process data under these legal bases:
legalBases.contract: Performance of a contract (providing the app you requested).

privacy.sharingDesc: We do not sell your data. We share limited data with providers that help us deliver the service:

thirdParties.firebase: Firebase (Authentication, Firestore, Storage) to sign in, store your data, and host content.
thirdParties.payments: Payment processors (Stripe, MercadoPago) for subscriptions. Their privacy policies apply.
thirdParties.auth: OAuth providers (e.g., Google) when you choose social sign-in.

privacy.internationalTransfers: Data may be processed and stored in countries outside your own (e.g., the United States) depending on our providers' infrastructure.
privacy.securityDesc: We use industry-standard safeguards and Firebase security rules. No method of transmission or storage is completely secure.
privacy.cookiesDesc: We use localStorage/sessionStorage and PWA caches to keep you signed in, store preferences, and enable offline use.

cookiesItems.auth: Authentication tokens to maintain your session.
cookiesItems.prefs: Preferences such as language, theme, and roles.
cookiesItems.pwa: Offline caches for faster loading and limited offline functionality.

push.title: Push notifications
push.desc: If enabled, we may send reminders or service updates. You can disable notifications in your device settings.

ai.title: AI features
ai.desc: When you use AI assistant features, your prompts and context may be processed to generate responses. Avoid sharing sensitive personal data.

retention.title: Data retention
retention.desc: We retain your data while your account is active. You can delete content or your account at any time; residual backups may persist for a limited period.

privacy.advertisingDesc: We do not currently serve third-party ads. If we add advertising (e.g., AdSense), we will update this policy and request any required consent.
privacy.rightsDesc: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

rightsList.access: Access the data we hold about you.
rightsList.portability: Receive a portable copy of your data.

children.title: Children and age limits
children.desc: This app is intended only for individuals of legal age to consume or cultivate cannabis in their jurisdiction. Do not use the app if it is illegal for you to do so.

privacy.changesDesc: We may update this policy. Material changes will be highlighted with an updated date.

terms.title: Terms
terms.acceptanceDesc: By using Cannafriend you agree to these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
terms.useDesc: You agree not to misuse the app, interfere with others' use, attempt to access non-public areas, or violate applicable laws.

prohibited.illegal: No illegal activity or content. Respect cannabis laws applicable to you.
prohibited.abuse: No harassment, spam, or abusive behavior.
prohibited.security: No attempts to breach, probe, or scan the service or related systems.
prohibited.scraping: No automated scraping without prior written consent.

eligibility.title: Eligibility and legal compliance
eligibility.desc: You must be of legal age and permitted by local law to cultivate or consume cannabis. You are solely responsible for complying with your jurisdiction's laws.

medical.title: No medical or legal advice
medical.desc: Information in the app (including AI outputs) is for informational purposes only and is not medical or legal advice. Consult licensed professionals for guidance.

terms.accountDesc: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login and for all activities under your account. Notify us of any unauthorized use.

userContent.title: Your content
userContent.desc: You retain ownership of content you submit (plants, logs, images, stash). You grant us a limited license to host, store, process, and display your content solely to operate and improve the service.

subscriptions.title: Premium subscriptions and payments
subscriptions.desc: Premium features may be offered via recurring subscriptions handled by payment processors (e.g., Stripe, MercadoPago). You can cancel at any time as described by the processor. Refunds are handled per the processor's terms and applicable law.

terms.privacyDesc: See our Privacy Policy for details about how we collect and use data.

ip.title: Intellectual property
ip.desc: The app, logos, and content (other than your content) are owned by us or our licensors and are protected by law.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.desc: The service is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind. Use at your own risk.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.desc: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the app.

terms.terminationDesc: We may suspend or terminate access if you violate these Terms or misuse the service.
terms.changesDesc: We may update these Terms. Continued use after changes means you accept the updated Terms.

landing.hero: Your Complete Cannabis Growing Companion - Track, manage, and optimize your plants with powerful tools designed specifically for cannabis cultivation.
landing.whyChooseDesc: The most complete and easy-to-use growing tool

benefits.easyToUseDesc: Intuitive interface for growers of all levels
benefits.completelyPrivateDesc: Your data stays secure and private
benefits.betterResultsDesc: Optimize your grow with accurate data

imageUpload.tapToSelect: Tap Add Photo to choose images
imageUpload.orClick: Or use the Add Photo button

updates.title: Update available
updates.description: A new version of the app is available. Please update to continue.

settings.title: Settings
settings.accountDesc: Manage your account information and session
settings.accountDeletedDesc: Your account and data were removed

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to browse, you accept their use.

premium.title: Premium required
premium.analyzeDesc: This feature requires a premium subscription. Upgrade your account to access the AI assistant.
premium.mercadoPago: We are working on MercadoPago integration to offer you the best payment experience.

subscription.title: Premium Subscription
subscription.cancelDesc: Cancel your premium subscription. You will lose access to premium features immediately.
subscription.confirmCancelDesc: This action will cancel your premium subscription. You won't be able to access premium features.
subscription.cancelledDesc: Your premium subscription has been cancelled successfully
subscription.alreadyCancelled: You don't have an active subscription to cancel
subscription.mercadopagoNote: For MercadoPago subscriptions, you can also cancel from your MercadoPago account
